info.name: Pandora Flat & Wide v0.53
info.description:
Widened it up to fit the screen. Changed the colors to make it easier on the eyes and cleaner. 

I put all the CSS controlling background colors at the top, so if you want to change the color scheme, you can edit it in lines 5-25 under the "Colors" heading.
info.additionalInfo:
v0.53 (12-09-14)
- fixed Date and A-Z sort buttons so that they work

v0.52 (11-28-14)
- minor tweaking to sidebar and details buttons

v0.51
- fixed background color
- put back the details buttons for Freemium compatibility 

v0.5 (11-08-14)
- released
